component.name: SDL-Image
component.summary: Image loading library for Simple DirectMedia Layer 1.2

description.p: The Simple DirectMedia Layer (SDL) is a library that allows programs portable low level access to a video framebuffer, audio output, mouse, and keyboard.
This is a simple library to load images of various formats as SDL surfaces. It supports the following formats: BMP, GIF, JPEG, LBM, PCX, PNG, PNM, TGA, TIFF, WEBP, XCF, XPM, XV.
